docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama urged Congress to help restore opportunity for Americans but pledged to take action himself Tuesday in his fifth State of the Union address before Congress. Some highlights from Obama's economic and other proposals:

headline.main: Highlights From Obama's State of the Union Address
headline.print_headline: Highlights From Obama's State of the Union Address

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama urged Congress to help restore opportunity for Americans but pledged to take action himself Tuesday in his fifth State of the Union address before Congress. Some highlights from Obama's economic and other proposals:

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama on Tuesday offered a campaign blueprint for fellow Democrats who are facing a tough election this November: Challenge Republicans who criticize his signature healthcare law to come up with something better.

headline.main: Analysis: Obama Offers Prescription for Democrats in Tough Election Year
headline.print_headline: Analysis: Obama Offers Prescription for Democrats in Tough Election Year

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama on Tuesday offered a campaign blueprint for fellow Democrats who are facing a tough election this November: Challenge Republicans who criticize his signature healthcare law to come up with something better.

docs.abstract: Provisions of the Affordable Care Act are likely to hurt young women whose employers cut their hours from full time to part time, an economist writes.
docs.snippet: Provisions of the Affordable Care Act are likely to hurt young women whose employers cut their hours from full time to part time, an economist writes.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: A judge rightfully blocked onerous restrictions imposed by Missouri on counselors who help people enroll in health insurance plans.
docs.abstract: Editorial praises ruling by Federal Judge Ortrie Smith to block restrictions imposed by Missouri on federally approved counselors who help people understand and enroll in health insurance plans under the Affordable Care Act; contends the ruling's reasoning applies to similar laws or regulations adopted by more than a dozen Republican-led states that are doing their best to sabotage health care reform.
docs.snippet: A judge rightfully blocked onerous restrictions imposed by Missouri on counselors who help people enroll in health insurance plans.

docs.lead_paragraph: Debt can pile up quickly for couples trying in-vitro fertilization and other assisted reproductive technologies.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Republicans have been promising to “repeal and replace” the health law for years. Now we know what they want to replace it with.

docs.lead_paragraph: After five years of political combat, President Obama declared independence from Congress in his address, outlining a list of economic actions he will take without legislative approval.

headline.main: In State of the Union Address, Obama Vows to Act Alone on the Economy
headline.print_headline: Obama Taking Up Economic Issues on His Authority

docs.abstract: Pres Obama, in his State of the Union address, declares independence from Congress after five years of fractious political combat; vows to tackle American income inequality with series of economic initiatives that he will enact, if necessary, without legislative approval; defiantly promises a 'year of action' as he tries to rejuvenate a presidency mired in low approval ratings and stymied by partisan stalemates.
docs.snippet: After five years of political combat, President Obama declared independence from Congress in his address, outlining a list of economic actions he will take without legislative approval.
